availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Branch (Trimble County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Frances Wright Branch in Oldham County in March 1828. Father of Robert Branch, L. Branch, B. Branch, James Branch, M. Branch, Turpin Branch, John Branch, Susan Branch, Edward Branch, and Harvy Branch. Farmer in Trimble County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District 1, p. 404A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, Abbottsford, p. 201.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Oldham County Marriages, Film #000482443, p. 97.
Kentucky, Wills and Probate Records, 1774-1989, Kentucky County, District, and Probate Courts, Trimbe County Administrators Bond Books, 1885-1966, p. 24 of microfilm (Accessed via Ancestry.com on September 15, 2020).
